animeTitle: Suna no Bara: Yuki no Mokushiroku
animeDescription: Mariko Rosebank leads a team of all-female anti-terrorist mercenaries, named C.A.T. This all-woman team is sent to guard a meeting of world leaders against a terrorist attack.   (Source: AniDB)
